short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts all Twitter permalinks to use fxtwitter.com instead of twitter.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
All tweet (or "post") permalinks on Twitter/X will be modified to use "fxtwitter" as the base domain. This makes it easier to share tweets with Discord-friendly embed-ability.

Bonus feature: Clicking a post's "Share" button instantly copies its fxtwitter link to the clipboard.
